cdir_events_options.notes: Is the player faction ALLIED with the key-specified FACTION? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction ALLIED with AT LEAST ONE FACTION belonging to the key-specified SUBCULTURE? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
[OBSOLETE] Is the player faction allied with whichever clan rules the Shogunate?
Can the player faction sustain ADDITIONAL ARMIES?
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE ARMY in an ENEMY REGION?
[OBSOLETE] Does the Ashikaga clan rules the Shogunate?
Is the player faction AT WAR with any factions belonging to the key-specified SUBCULTURE?
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE instance of the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction currently able to CONSTRUCT the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN in one of their settlements? Multiple use operator: AND.
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction currently able to CONSTRUCT the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL in one of their settlements? Multiple use operator: AND.
Does the player faction have an instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL in at least HALF of their REGIONS? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Does the player faction have an instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL in AT LEAST ONE-QUARTER of their REGIONS? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Does the player faction have an instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL in at least THREE-QUARTERS of their REGIONS? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Is the CAMPAIGN being played this key-specified one? Multiple use operator: OR.
Can the player faction currently RECRUIT the unit_key-specified UNIT? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Can the player faction currently RECRUIT the unit_caste-specified UNIT? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Can the player faction currently RECRUIT the unit_category-specified UNIT? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Can the player faction currently RECRUIT the unit_class-specified UNIT? Multiple use operator: UNSURE!
Is the player faction currently CONSTRUCTING a building from the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction currently CONSTRUCTING the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction currently NOT CONSTRUCTING a building from the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the player faction currently NOT CONSTRUCTING the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL? Multiple use operator: AND.
Did the player choose the FIRST OPTION when faced with the key-specified DILEMMA? Multiple use operator: OR. [NOTE: We require additional options for CHOSEN_THIRD and CHOSEN_FOURTH]
Did the player choose the SECOND OPTION when faced with the key-specified DILEMMA? Multiple use operator: OR. [NOTE: We require additional options for CHOSEN_THIRD and CHOSEN_FOURTH]
Has the key-specified DILEMMA been GENERATED for the player during this campaign? Multiple use operator: OR.
Did the player NOT choose the FIRST OPTION when faced with the key-specified DILEMMA? Multiple use operator: OR. [NOTE: We require additional options for CHOSEN_THIRD and CHOSEN_FOURTH]
Did the player NOT choose the SECOND OPTION when faced with the key-specified DILEMMA? Multiple use operator: OR. [NOTE: We require additional options for CHOSEN_THIRD and CHOSEN_FOURTH]
Has the key-specified DILEMMA NOT been GENERATED for the player during this campaign? Multiple use operator: OR.
Is there an ENEMY ARMY in any of the player faction's REGIONS?
Is the player currently playing as this FACTION? Multiple use operator: OR.
Specify the FIRST ROUND that a random event may be GENERATED during a campaign.
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE instance of the key-specified AGENT? Multiple use operator: OR (use semi colon).
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE ARMY?
Does the player faction have AT LEAST ONE NAVY?
Does the player faction own a port?
Has the key-specified INCIDENT been GENERATED for the player during this campaign? Multiple use operator: OR.
Has the key-specified INCIDENT NOT been GENERATED for the player during this campaign? Multiple use operator: OR.
[OBSOLETE] Is the player faction in the process of assuming control of the Shogunate?
[OBSOLETE] Does the player faction rule the Shogunate?
Specify the LAST ROUND that a random event may be GENERATED during a campaign.
Is the player faction ALLIED with NO MORE THAN the specified number of FACTIONS?
Of all the player faction's UNITS, do NO MORE THAN the specified proportion of them belong to the ARTILLERY category?
[OBSOLETE] Does the player faction have NO MORE THAN the specified average proportion of Buddhism across their territory?
Of all the player faction's UNITS, do NO MORE THAN the specified proportion of them belong to the CAVALRY category?
[OBSOLETE] Does the player faction have NO MORE THAN the specified average proportion of Christianity across their territory?
[BROKEN?] Of all the player faction's researched TECHNOLOGIES, are NO MORE THAN the specified proportion CIVIL TECHNOLOGIES?
Does the player faction own NO MORE THAN the specified number of COASTAL REGIONS? (the region borders the sea - does not necessarily have a port!)
[OBSOLETE] Does the player faction's daimyo have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of Honour.
[BROKEN?] Of all the player faction's researched TECHNOLOGIES, are NO MORE THAN the specified proportion ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGIES?
Is the player faction ALLIED with NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
[BROKEN?] Has the player faction GIVEN MILITARY ACCESS to NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
[BROKEN?] Has the player faction RECEIVED MILITARY ACCESS from NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
Is the player faction NEUTRAL towards NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
[BROKEN?] Is the player faction the OVERLORD of NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
Is the player faction TRADING with NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
Is the player faction AT WAR with NO MORE THAN the specified number of NEIGHBOURING FACTIONS?
Does the player faction have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM.
[OBSOLETE] Is the player faction's FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM level NO HIGHER THAN the given Shogun-specific fame level?
Is the player faction's FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM level NO HIGHER THAN the value specified?
Does the player faction have NO MORE THAN the specified number of MILITARY FORCES.
[OBSOLETE] Was the player faction's highest ever FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM level NO HIGHER THAN the given Shogun-specific fame level?
Of all the player faction's UNITS, do NO MORE THAN the specified proportion of them belong to the MELEE INFANTRY category?
Of all the player faction's UNITS, do NO MORE THAN the specified proportion of them belong to the RANGED INFANTRY category?

[BROKEN?] Has the player faction RECEIVED MILITARY ACCESS from NO MORE THAN the specified number of FACTIONS?
[BROKEN?] Of all the player faction's researched TECHNOLOGIES, are NO MORE THAN the specified proportion MILITARY TECHNOLOGIES?

Specify a further PERCENTAGE CHANCE that this EVENT will be GENERATED in spite of all its OPTIONS / CONDITIONS being satisfied. Used mainly for PRIORITISED EVENTS (always triggering).
[OBSOLETE] Has the player faction experienced realm divide yet?
Is the player faction currently experiencing a REBELLION somewhere?
Does the player faction belong to a key-specified RELIGION? Multiple use operator: OR.
Is the player faction currently RESEARCHING a CIVIL TECHNOLOGY?
Is the player faction currently RESEARCHING an ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY?
Is the player faction currently RESEARCHING a MILITARY TECHNOLOGY?
Specify the number of ROUNDS that must elapse before the SAME EVENT can be GENERATED again. The EVENT cannot be UNIQUE.
Is it NOT currently the key-specified SEASON? Multiple use operator: OR.

Has the player NOT RESEARCHED the key-specified TECHNOLOGY?

[OBSOLETE] Is the player NOT currently occupying a key-specified trade node?
Is the player faction TRADING with the key-specified FACTION? Multiple use operator: AND.
Specify that the EVENT is UNIQUE. Once GENERATED, it will NEVER be GENERATED again.
[OBSOLETE] Is the player faction at war with the Shogunate?
Is the player faction AT WAR with the key-specified FACTION? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER an AGENT?
[OBSOLETE] Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a Metsuke?
[OBSOLETE] Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a Missionary?
[OBSOLETE] Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a Monk?
[OBSOLETE] Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a Ninja?
Specify that a EVENT TARGET CHARACTER must be the specified Agent Subtype.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) ALLIED with AN ALLY of the player faction?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) ALLIED with AN ENEMY of the player faction?
Speify that you allow tageting of rebel regions for region target generation... Only work in conjuction with GEN_CND_REGION
[OBSOLETE] Is the event target or its owner an ally of the Shogunate?
Does the player have at least ONE ARMY in the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) ?
[OBSOLETE] Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION assuming control of the Shogunate?
Does the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) contain a FACTION CAPITAL?
Of the BATTLES FOUGHT by this EVENT TARGET CHARACTER, have the specified PERCENTAGE of VICTORIES been achieved?
The character Id given to them in the startpos data
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER NOT have the key-specified TRAIT.
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER have the key-specified TRAIT.
Specify that a EVENT TARGET CHARACTER must be a key-specified CHARACTER TYPE.
[OBSOLETE] Is the event target character a Daimyo?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) DEFENSIVE ALLIES with the player faction?
Can the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) engage in diplomacy with the player faction?
Is the EVENT TARGET embarked upon the sea? Used primarily for ARMY targets.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) an ENEMY of one of the player faction's ALLIES that belongs to the key-specified SUBCULTURE.
The key of the targeted faction
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) possess an instance of the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Can the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently CONSTRUCT the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) possess an instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL? Multiple use operator: AND.

Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently have an ARMY?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently have a NAVY?
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a FACTION LEADER?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) managed to CONSTRUCT the maximum level of the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) a NEIGHBOUR of the player faction?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT possess an instance of the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Can the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT CONSTRUCT the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT possess an instance of the key-specified BUILDING LEVEL? Multiple use operator: AND.
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT hold a COASTAL REGION?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT in the process of CONSTRUCTING a BUILDING?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT have an ARMY?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT have a NAVY?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT managed to CONSTRUCT the maximum level of the key-specified BUILDING CHAIN? Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT a NEIGHBOUR of the player faction?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT currently experiencing a REBELLION somewhere?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently NOT RECRUITING any UNITS?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT belong to the key-specified RELIGION?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT the same RELIGION as the player faction?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT possess an instance of the key-specified SLOT TYPE. Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently experiencing a REBELLION somewhere?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) currently RECRUITING any UNITS?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) belong to the key-specified RELIGION?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) the same RELIGION as the player faction?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) possess an instance of the key-specified SLOT TYPE. Multiple use operator: AND.
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a FEMALE?
Does the EVENT TARGET MILITARY FORCE (or a MILITARY FORCE within the EVENT TARGET REGION) currently have a key-specified EFFECT BUNDLE applied to it?

Does the EVENT TARGET REGION contain a MILITARY FORCE belonging to the player faction? Note that despite referring to PROVINCE, I think that this only works with REGIONS - we can't yet target PROVINCES.
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) AT WAR with any faction?
Specify that a faction must have atleast one enemy with a region that the player can occupy to be a valid target
Specify that a faction must have atleast one enemy with a region to be a valid target
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) NOT AT WAR with any faction?
Is the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) a FACTION'S HOME REGION?
Is the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) a HUMAN player?
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER or MILITARY FORCE currently standing within an ENEMY REGION?
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER have the lowest loyalty (or inter-factional loyalty) of all characters in the GEN_CND_SUBCULTURE key (must specify this)?
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER a MALE?
Specify that a CHARACTER event requires a married character
Has the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER fought NO MORE THAN the specified number of BATTLES?
Has the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER fought NO MORE THAN the specified number of LOSING BATTLES?
Has the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER fought and NO MORE THAN the specified number of WINNING BATTLES?
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of AMBITION?
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of GRAVITAS?
Is the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER of RANK NO HIGHER THAN that specified?
[OBSOLETE PENDING RE-USE FOR FAMILY GAMEPLAY] Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of LOYALTY / FAMILY ATTITUDE?
Does the EVENT TARGET CHARACTER'S POLITICAL PARTY have NO MORE THAN the specified PERCENTAGE of POLITICAL POWER / INFLUENCE?
[OBSOLETE] Does the event target faction or owning faction's daimyo have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of honour?
[BROKEN?] Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) have a DIPLOMATIC STANDING of NO MORE THAN the specified amount with the player faction?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM?
[OBSOLETE] Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) have NO MORE THAN the given Shogun-specific fame level?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) have a FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM LEVEL which is NO HIGHER THAN the specified amount?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) had a FAME / PRESTIGE / IMPERIUM LEVEL which is NO HIGHER THAN that specified ever during the course of a campaign?
Is the EVENT TARGET'S distance (in terms of NUMBER OF REGIONS) from the player faction's ORIGINAL HOME REGION NO FURTHER THAN that specified?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) fought NO MORE THAN the specified number of BATTLES against the player faction?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) fought NO MORE THAN the specified number of LOSING BATTLES against the player faction?
Has the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) fought NO MORE THAN the specified number of WINNING BATTLES against the player faction?
Does the PROVINCE to which the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) belongs have NO MORE THAN the specified SLAVE PERCENTAGE?
Does the EVENT TARGET FACTION (or the FACTION that OWNS the EVENT TARGET) OWN NO MORE THAN the specified number of REGIONS?

Is the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) NO FURTHER THAN the specified distance (in terms of NUMBER OF REGIONS) from the player faction's BORDERS (0 = neighbouring).
[BROKEN?] Does the PROVINCE to which the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) belongs have NO MORE THAN the specified amount of PUBLIC ORDER?
Does the SETTLEMENT within the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) contain NO MORE THAN the specified NUMBER OF UNITS.
Does the EVENT TARGET REGION (or the REGION where the EVENT TARGET IS LOCATED) contain NO MORE THAN the specified NUMBER OF UNITS.

Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a CHARACTER. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a FACTION. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a MILITARY FORCE. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that there is NO EVENT TARGET. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)

Specifies that the EVENT TARGET is INHERITED from the PARENT EVENT. This is only applicable to FOLLOWUP EVENTS. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET comes from a political event (CAN ONLY BE USED WITH POLITICAL EVENT GENERATED EVENTS)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be an actor in a political event (CAN ONLY BE USED WITH POLITICAL EVENT GENERATED EVENTS)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a target in a political event (CAN ONLY BE USED WITH POLITICAL EVENT GENERATED EVENTS)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a REGION. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a SETTLEMENT. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a SLOT. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies that the EVENT TARGET must be a TECHNOLOGY. (May not be used in conjunction with other GEN_TARGET OPTIONS. All EVENTS must have a GEN_TARGET OPTION.)
Specifies the relative chance that an EVENT that satisfies its EVENT OPTIONS will be GENERATED. A WEIGHTING, NOT an actual PERCENTAGE.
Specifies the MAXIMUM number of turns before a FOLLOWUP EVENT will be triggered after its PARENT EVENT has fired. I *think* this is a required parameter.
Specifies the MINIMUM number of turns before a FOLLOWUP EVENT will be triggered after its PARENT EVENT has fired. I *think* this is a required parameter.
Specifies the PERCENTAGE CHANCE of GENERATING one of the associated FOLLOWUP EVENTS.
Specifies the MAXIMUM number of turns which may be RANDOMLY ADDED to a MISSION turn allowance.
Specifies the MINIMUM number of turns which must be RANDOMLY ADDED to a MISSION turn allowance.
Specifies a MISSION length is infinite.
Specifies a MISSION's MAXIMUM turn allowance.
Specifies a MISSION's MINIMUM turn allowance.
Multiplies the final MISSION turn allowance for EASY CAMPAIGNS. MUST have a decimal (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, etc).
Multiplies the final MISSION turn allowance for HARD CAMPAIGNS. MUST have a decimal (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, etc).
Multiplies the final MISSION turn allowance for NORMAL CAMPAIGNS. MUST have a decimal (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, etc).
Multiplies the final MISSION turn allowance for VERY HARD and LEGENDARY CAMPAIGNS. MUST have a decimal (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, etc).
Specify that a CHARACTER-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be a key-specified AGENT.
Specify that a CHARACTER-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be a key-specified AGENT SUBTYPE.
The amount of the variable that the mission objective requires, expressed as a float value.
The amount of the variable that the mission objective requires, expressed as an integer value.
Specify that an FORCE-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be an ARMY.
Specify that a BUILDING-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be a key-specified BUILDING CHAIN.
Specify that a BUILDING-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be a key-specified BUILDING LEVEL.
The id of the character
Specify that the MISSION OBJECTIVE associated with the mission will involve acting against an ENEMY of the TARGET FACTION.
Specify that a FORCE-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be invading the PLAYER FACTION's REGIONS.
Specify that an FORCE-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be an NAVY.
The number of agents the mission objective requires
The number of armies the mission objective requires
The number of characters to complete the objective
The number of provinces
The number of regions the mission objective requires
The number of settlements the mission objective requires
The number of turns to complete the objective
The number of units the mission objective requires
Specify that a RELIGION-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must be the specified percentage of the PLAYER FACTION'S RELIGION.
Specify that a FORCE-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must conclude in a VICTORY.
The resources type of the resource related objective
Specify that a FACTION-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve a key-specified SUBCULTURE
Specify that a TECHNOLOGY-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve research of a TECHNOLOGY from the key-specified CATEGORY.
Specify that a RECRUITMENT-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve recruitment of a key-specified UNIT.
Specify that a RECRUITMENT-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve recruitment of a UNIT from a key-specified CASTE.
Specify that a RECRUITMENT-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve recruitment of a UNIT from a key-specified CATEGORY.
Specify that a RECRUITMENT-RELATED MISSION OBJECTIVE must involve recruitment of a UNIT from a key-specified CLASS.
placeholder
